## HDOMImplementation.createTextElement() method

Creates and appends the given `content` as text child node to `parent` in the target.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createTextElement(parent: T, content: string): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  parent | <code>T</code> | parent node in target (e.g. DOM element) |
|  content | <code>string</code> | content |

<b>Returns:</b>

`T`
